title: Game sometimes freezes in champion select
body: At 0 second, my pc completely freezes and I can't do anything about it. Am I the only one? I just lost a game because of this.

replies.body: Are you getting any error messages?  Is anything loading at all after champion select?  I'd like to help but need more details on what you mean by freezing exactly.  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AAtbHOIE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-14T23:29:10.638+0000)
>
> Are you getting any error messages?  Is anything loading at all after champion select?  I'd like to help but need more details on what you mean by freezing exactly.  Let me know!

Literally nothing. Just freezes. Nothing that I tried on keyboard fixed this problem. I restarted my laptop but It was too late.

Are you one Windows 10 and recently updated it?  This issue sounds like it's being caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing instant freezes for some players.  Disabling it should do the trick!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AAtbHOIE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-17T16:16:16.066+0000)

I'm stil using Windows 7. :P

It is super rare but it can cause insta lose for me, which is unaccaptable even for a rare issue.

Bummer!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually.  It would help to take a closer look by attaching some logs which can be obtained through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Our tech team will review your specific issue and get back to you!
